title: Lead Business Analyst -Exchange Traded Derivative
description:
We are seeking a Lead Business Analyst with expertise in ETD/OTC to join our team.

As a Lead Business Analyst with expertise in Exchange Traded Derivatives (ETD) and Over-the-counter (OTC) traded financial instruments, you will play a critical role in analyzing and understanding the impact of market and regulatory changes on the IT F2B stack. With a focus on the clearing business, you will leverage your deep knowledge to contribute to the lifecycle and markets of ETD and OTC products.

Start an exciting new chapter in your career with EPAM!

Responsibilities



Analyze and interpret market and regulatory changes affecting ETD and OTC traded financial instruments
Contribute to the lifecycle and markets of ETD and OTC products
Utilize strong stakeholder management and communication skills to collaborate effectively with internal and external partners
Query data sources using mid-level SQL skills for in-depth analysis
Provide valuable inputs on modern software development processes like Agile and incremental delivery



Requirements



8-12 years of experience in Business Analysis with a focus on ETD and OTC
Deep understanding of the Clearing business, specifically ETD (Must Have) and OTC (Ideally including products)
Ability to analyze and interpret market and regulatory changes and their impact on the IT F2B stack
Proficiency in querying data sources with mid-level SQL skills
Experience in modern software development processes such as Agile and incremental delivery
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Effective stakeholder management and communication skills
